    • 构造器详细资料

      • FloatingWindowFactory

        public FloatingWindowFactory(Context context,
                     int orientation)
        Use default LinearLayout as container
        参数:
        context -
        orientation - LinearLayout.VERTICAL
        LinearLayout.HORIZONTAL (Default)

      • FloatingWindowFactory

        public FloatingWindowFactory(Context context,
                     ViewGroup container)
        参数:
        context -
        container - ViewGroup with default layout parameters:
        ViewGroup.LayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT,ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT)

      • FloatingWindowFactory

        public FloatingWindowFactory(Context context,
                     ViewGroup container,
                     ViewGroup.LayoutParams lp)
        参数:
        context -
        container -
        lp - Customer's layout parameters

    • 方法详细资料

      • addView

        public void addView(View view)
        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child,
        the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child
        参数:
        view - the child view to add

      • addView

        public void addView(View view,
           int index)
        Adds a child view. If no layout parameters are already set on the child,
        the default parameters for this ViewGroup are set on the child.
        参数:
        view - the child view to add
        index - the position at which to add the child

      • addView

        public void addView(View view,
           ViewGroup.LayoutParams params)
        Adds a child view with the specified layout parameters.
        参数:
        view - the child view to add
        params - the layout parameters to set on the child

      • removeAllViews

        public void removeAllViews()
        Call this method to remove all child views from the ViewGroup
        and then remove itself from the window.

      • removeAllChildViews

        public void removeAllChildViews()
        Call this method to remove all child views from the ViewGroup

        autoAsign - true enabled otherwise false disabled
